trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs when calling methods on a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart"></xref> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref> class with the specified error message.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property to its default value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref> class with the specified serialization data.
An object that holds the serialized object data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>.
An object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
info is .
info is missing a required value.
info contains a value that cannot be cast to the correct type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref> class with the specified error message and the composition element that is the cause of the exception.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property to its default value.

The composition element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException.Element*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref> class with the specified error message and the exception that is the cause of this exception.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property to its default value.

The exception that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref> class with the specified error message, and the composition element and exception that are the cause of this exception.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property to its default value.

The composition element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException.Element*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

The exception that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to set the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets the composition element that is the cause of the exception.
The compositional element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets the serialization data for the exception.
After calling the method, contains serialized object data about the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartException"></xref>.
After calling the method, contains contextual information about the source or destination.
info is .
